title: The Kite Runner 2007 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
Kabul. Amir (Zekeria Ebrahimi) and Hassan (Ahmad Khan Mahmidzada) are two friends who have fun in a kite tournament. After the victory in this day an act of betrayal of a boy forever mark the life of both. Amir goes to live in the United States, returning to Afghanistan only after 20 years. That's when he faces the iron hand of the Taliban government to try to fix what happened in your past.
